definition: having a margin or fringe of hairlike projections, a protozoan with a microscopic appendage extending from the surface of the cell
details:
adjective
- having a margin or fringe of hairlike projections
= synonyms: ciliated
- of or relating to the human eyelash
= synonyms: ciliary
- of or relating to cilia projecting from the surface of a cell
= synonyms: ciliary
noun
- a protozoan with a microscopic appendage extending from the surface of the cell
= synonyms: ciliated protozoan
